law.text: The commissioner may, upon notice and opportunity for all interested persons to be heard, issue such orders as shall be necessary to carry out the provisions of this subtitle.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1477, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 52, sec. 6, effective June 16, 1972.
